scripts.gas:report: mkdir -p reports && REPORT_GAS=true hardhat test > reports/gas-report.txt
scripts.audit: bash -c 'set -e; mkdir -p reports; TMP=$(mktemp); if [ -f foundry.toml ]; then mv foundry.toml "$TMP"; fi; npx hardhat compile; PATH="$PATH:$(python3 -m site --user-base)/bin:$HOME/.foundry/bin" slither . --ignore-compile --checklist --filter-paths .github > reports/slither-report.txt; if [ -f "$TMP" ]; then mv "$TMP" foundry.toml; fi'
scripts.slither: bash -c 'set -e; TMP=$(mktemp); if [ -f foundry.toml ]; then mv foundry.toml "$TMP"; fi; npx hardhat compile; slither . --ignore-compile --checklist --filter-paths .github; if [ -f "$TMP" ]; then mv "$TMP" foundry.toml; fi'
scripts.mythril: bash -c 'mkdir -p reports && myth analyze --execution-timeout 300 contracts/Lockx.sol -o json > reports/mythril-lockx.json'
scripts.ci: npm run test && npm run forge:test && npm run coverage && npm run slither
scripts.build: npx hardhat compile && typechain --target ethers-v6 --out-dir typechain-types
